text: == Events == * Corfu taken from Byzantine Empire by Robert Guiscard, Norman King of Southern Italy * Byzantine emperor Nicephorus III is overthrown by Alexius I Comnenus, ending the Middle Byzantine period and beginning the Comnenan dynasty * Alexius I helps defend Albania from the Normans (the first recorded mention of Albania), but is defeated at the Battle of Dyrrhachium. * Beginning of the construction of Saint Canute's Cathedral in Odense. * May 8 â€“ Alfonso VI of Castile marries Constance of Burgundy. == Births == * December 1 - King Louis VI of France, French royal (died 1137)
